name: py-mouseinfo

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
An application to display XY position and RGB color information for the
pixel currently under the mouse. Works on Python 2 and 3. This is useful
for GUI automation planning.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-python3-xlib
dependencies.description: python3-xlib is python3 version of python-xlib.

dependencies.name: py-pyperclip
dependencies.description: A cross-platform clipboard module for Python.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
Pillow is a fork of the Python Imaging Library (PIL). It adds image
processing capabilities to your Python interpreter. This library
supports many file formats, and provides powerful image processing and
graphics capabilities.

dependent_to.name: py-pyautogui
dependent_to.description:
PyAutoGUI lets your Python scripts control the mouse and keyboard to
automate interactions with other applications.
